name: Proceedings regarding trustee's power to adjust ARTICLE 2.  DECEDENT'S ESTATE OR TERMINATING INCOME INTEREST
text: Proceedings regarding trustee's power to adjust.  In a proceeding with respect to a trustee's exercise or nonexercise of the power to make an adjustment under section 557A-104, the sole remedy shall be to direct, deny, or revise an adjustment between principal and income. [L 2000, c 191, pt of §1]
